snippet: The death toll in Syria’s three-year-old conflict has exceeded 150,000, an activist group said Tuesday as fighting raged across the country.
abstract: Britain-based group Syrian Observatory for Human Rights says that death toll in Syria's three-year-old conflict has exceeded 150,000.
lead_paragraph: The death toll in Syria’s three-year-old conflict has exceeded 150,000, an activist group said Tuesday as fighting raged across the country.

headline.main: Syria: War Deaths Top 150,000, Human Rights Group Says
headline.print_headline: Syria: War Deaths Top 150,000, Human Rights Group Says
